text: And he built the house with the 7. 39 Lit. thicket.wood of Libanus; its length was a hundred cubits, and its breadth was fifty cubits, and its height was of thirty cubits, and it was made 7. 39 Gr. of.with three rows of cedar pillars, and the pillars had 7. 39 Or, shoulders, or shoulder pieces.side-pieces of cedar.
